basic_info.name: BABA Institute of Technology and Sciences Highlights:
BABA Institute of Technology and Sciences Courses and Admission
BITS UG Programs
description: BITS provides four years B.Tech programs in Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering And Mechanical Engineering at UG Level. Admission to B.Tech. is done through AP EAMCET exam.

basic_info.name: BITS PG Programs
description: BITS provides M.Tech. Programs in CAD/ CAM, Computer Science & Technology, Power Electronics & Drives, Structural Engineering, VLSI Design and a BITS Vizag MBA Program in Finance, Human Resource Management, Marketing at PG level. Admission to M.Tech. Programs are based on PGECET exam and for MBA it accepts APICET Exam.

basic_info.name: Why Join BITS Vizag?
description: Excellent Infrastructure – The Institute has a wonderful building and airy classrooms that help to study and concentrate on the subject. A serene atmosphere that provides a calm and peaceful environment.
Scholarship –The College provides the scholarship to the SC/ST and OBC candidate and also a scholarship for meritorious students.
Experienced Faculty- The institute has well qualified and experienced faculty members who help the student to achieve their objectives.

Section.name: About BITS-VIZAG
Section.description:
BABA Institute of Technology and Sciences (BITS Vizag) Vishakhapatnam is the pioneer Private Institution in the field of Engineering and MBA. It is a full-fledged college, sprawling in a 15 acres piece of land and imparting undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technical University (JNTUK), Kakinada and approved by AICTE, New Delhi, located in the lush green city of Vishakhapatnam of Andhra Pradesh state. The Institute was established with the objective of providing quality technical education with adequate industrial exposure, catering to the needs of the youth with its innovative teaching methods. BITS Admissions 2024 to all regular courses is based on state-level competitive exams such as AP EAMCET, AP PGECET, and APICET.
Check BABA Institute of Technology and Sciences B.Tech. Cutoff

BITS provides four years B.Tech programs in Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering And Mechanical Engineering at UG Level. Admission to B.Tech. is done through AP EAMCET exam.
BITS provides M.Tech. Programs in CAD/ CAM, Computer Science & Technology, Power Electronics & Drives, Structural Engineering, VLSI Design and a BITS Vizag MBA Program in Finance, Human Resource Management, Marketing at PG level. Admission to M.Tech. Programs are based on PGECET exam and for MBA it accepts APICET Exam.
